T11sbpramvu:1849: yady apy atrānupalabdhir iti na śrutis tathāpīdaṃ svabhāvaviruddhākhyaṃ liṅgam anupalabdheḥ sakāśān na pṛthag ucyate /
T11sbpramvu:1850: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tata evānupalambhād virodhagateḥ virodhāc cābhāvasādhanāt* viruddho hi kathaṃ niścīyeta /
T11sbpramvu:1852: 2 /// palabdher abhāvāsiddher ity arthād viruddhavi .. ne 'nupalabdhir eva prayu .. .. .. .iti /
T11sbpramvu:1853: bhavatu nāmaivaṃvidhāyāyā dṛśyaviṣayā anupalabdheḥ sakāśād abhāvagatir ataś ceyaṃ pramāṇaṃ sā punaḥ katham anumānaṃ kiṃtu pramāṇāntaram eveti bhāvaḥ /
T11sbpramvu:1854: kathaṃ vā na syād ity ācāryaḥ /
T11sbpramvu:1857: 3 /// .. .. .. .. mānaṃ dṛṣṭāntānapekṣatām edva na hītyādinā prāha /
T11sbpramvu:1858: asyām ity anupalabdhau kiṃ na nirupākhyam ityādi ācāryaḥ dṛṣṭānta evety arthaḥ /
T11sbpramvu:1860: tad vyomakusumādi asad iti kathaṃ kena pramāṇenāvagantavyaṃ yenaivaṃ syāt* /
T11sbpramvu:1861: anupalaabdher liṅgād abhāve sādhye dṛṣṭāntaḥ syād ity arthaḥ /
T11sbpramvu:1864: athātrāpy aparo dṛṣṭāntas tasyā vyomakusumādyasattāsiddheḥ sadṛṣṭāntatve vānavasthāprasaṃgaḥ /
T11sbpramvu:1865: tatrāpy aparo dṛṣṭāntas tatrāpy aparo 'pīti kṛtvā /
T11sbpramvu:1866: tathā cānavasthāyāṃ satyāṃ ekasyāpi siddhāv apratipattiḥ /
T11sbpramvu:1868: 5 /// .. labdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya anupalabdher ityādāv api prayoge dṛṣṭāntānapekṣaṇād ananumānam anupalabdhiḥ /
T11sbpramvu:1870: sakṛd uktaṃ yathā svabhāvānupalabdhau nābhāvaḥ sādhyate kiṃtu abhāvavyavahāra iti tacchṛṇvann api /
T11sbpramvu:1871: mūrkhasya trīṇi nāmāni devo divyaḥ prajayatir ity ato devānāṃ mūrkhāṇāṃ pri .. ///
T11sbpramvu:1875: sā nimittaṃ kāraṇaṃ sadvyavahārāṇāṃ sānupalabdhiḥ svasannidhānād ātmanā sannidhānāt* /
